name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Margherita with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Fresh romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

name: Tiramisu
description: Traditional Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Roman pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.

name: Garlic Bread
description: Toasted bread with garlic, butter, and parsley.

name: Panna Cotta
description: Creamy Italian dessert topped with a berry sauce.

name: Grilled Chicken
description: Juicy grilled chicken breast served with a side of vegetables.

name: Bruschetta
description: Toasted bread topped with fresh tomatoes, garlic, basil, and olive oil.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey molten center.

name: Minestrone Soup
description: Hearty Italian vegetable soup with pasta and beans.
